argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | erclwwlk.r | |- .~ = { <. u , w >. | ( u e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ w e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` w ) ) u = ( w cyclShift n ) ) } |
| 2 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( u = U -> ( u e. ( V ClWWalks E ) <-> U e. ( V ClWWalks E ) ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( u = U /\ w = W ) -> ( u e. ( V ClWWalks E ) <-> U e. ( V ClWWalks E ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eleq1 | |- ( w = W -> ( w e. ( V ClWWalks E ) <-> W e. ( V ClWWalks E ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( u = U /\ w = W ) -> ( w e. ( V ClWWalks E ) <-> W e. ( V ClWWalks E ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = W -> ( # ` w ) = ( # ` W ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq2d | |- ( w = W -> ( 0 ... ( # ` w ) ) = ( 0 ... ( # ` W ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( u = U /\ w = W ) -> ( 0 ... ( # ` w ) ) = ( 0 ... ( # ` W ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( u = U /\ w = W ) -> u = U ) |
| 10 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( w = W -> ( w cyclShift n ) = ( W cyclShift n ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( u = U /\ w = W ) -> ( w cyclShift n ) = ( W cyclShift n ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( ( u = U /\ w = W ) -> ( u = ( w cyclShift n ) <-> U = ( W cyclShift n ) ) ) |
| 13 | 8, 12 | #P_rexeqbidv | |- ( ( u = U /\ w = W ) -> ( E. n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` w ) ) u = ( w cyclShift n ) <-> E. n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` W ) ) U = ( W cyclShift n ) ) ) |
| 14 | 3, 5, 13 | #P_3anbi123d | |- ( ( u = U /\ w = W ) -> ( ( u e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ w e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` w ) ) u = ( w cyclShift n ) ) <-> ( U e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ W e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` W ) ) U = ( W cyclShift n ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 14, 1 | #P_brabga | |- ( ( U e. X /\ W e. Y ) -> ( U .~ W <-> ( U e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ W e. ( V ClWWalks E ) /\ E. n e. ( 0 ... ( # ` W ) ) U = ( W cyclShift n ) ) ) ) |
